price: ಹೌದು! ನಮಗೆ ಅವನ ಬೆರಳ ತುದಿಗಳನ್ನು ಕೂಡ ಸರಿಪಡಿಸುವ ಸಾಮರ್ಥ್ಯವಿದೆ.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Kannada translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kannada language, translated by Muhammad Hamza Battur.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
